## TryCpScenario.shareAllAgents() method

Registers all agents of all passed in conductors to each other. This skips peer discovery through gossip and thus accelerates test runs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
shareAllAgents(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
